35.ara-name: كتاب الشهادات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ayman bin Khuraim narrated that the Prophet (s.a.w) stood to give a Khutbah and said:"O you people False witness is tantamount to Shirk with Allah" Then the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w)recited: So shun the Rijs of the idols, and shun false speech

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي شَهَادَةِ الزُّورِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Bearing False Witness
